txt.en: Your animal companions were introduced into the battlefield at a young age and, as such, display great prowess in mounted combat.
In Rohirrim:\nDecreases your perceived threat by an additional [placeholder] while your War Wolf is active.\n
In Riddermark:\nYour War Wolf will reduce the enemy's attack speed by an additional [placeholder].\n
In Red Dawn:\nIncreases your crit chance by an additional [placeholder] while your War Wolf is active.
